body:
### ScalaFX - Ensemble.
ScalaFX Ensemble is a project which is inspired from [http://jfxtras.org/](http://jfxtras.org/) which is developed in JavaFX. Instead this project is developed in [ScalaFX](http://code.google.com/p/scalafx/). We know that it looks slightly different from the JavaFx Ensemble we are working towards it thus making it as better as possible !!!! 

### Update 
We are done with the most of the controls in the ScalaFx (including charts,grapics2d). However all these are bleeding edge releases as we are looking forward for the first level of launch of ScalaFx API. On case to case basis we jump-in to fix any issues in the API itself. Again stay tuned .... 

![latest screenshot](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/10783650/Screen%20Shot%202012-12-25%20at%208.19.56%20AM.png)

### Update 
We made some more progress on creating more examples here is the latest screenshot. We are looking forward to release stay tuned !!!! 

![latest screen shot](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/10783650/Screen%20Shot%202012-12-15%20at%203.13.01%20PM.png)

### Latest Screen Shot
We are very actively working to get the first release out. But to keep you posted here is the latest screenshot. We are working on dashboard and other goodies stay tuned for further updates 

![latest screenshot](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/10783650/Screen%20Shot%202012-12-05%20at%207.29.52%20AM.png)
name: ScalaFX - Ensemble
tagline: Application which showcases various capabilities of ScalaFx written in ScalaFX itself ....
